title: Never Alone & The First Lightning Bug
description: Between the covers of this book you will find two wonderful stories. First you will be able to share with your child the story of a little boy named Alone, a little girl named Never, and how they have a positive effect on each other. The other explores the origin of the lightning bug in a fanciful way that will appeal to children of all ages.  Share these stories with your children and make memories that will last into the next generation.
author: Phillip Rhoades
